```{r}
library(tidyverse)
biden <- read_csv("biden.csv")
```

## Part 2:  `ggplot2` and the grammar of graphics

```{r}
biden_tidy <- biden %>%
  gather(dem, rep, key = "Party", value = "Value") %>%
  filter(Value != 0) %>%
  select(-Value)

ggplot(biden, aes(educ, biden, color = female)) +
  geom_point()
```
